Trade/Device Name(s): BD ProbeTec Herpes Simplex Viruses (HSV 1 & 2) Qx Amplified DNA Assays
BD ProbeTec Herpes Simplex Viruses (HSV 1 & 2) Q Amplified DNA Assays
BD ProbeTec Herpes Simplex Viruses (HSV1 & 2) Qr Amplified DNA Assays
Regulation Name(s): Herpes Simplex Virus Nucleic Acid Amplification Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD ProbeTec Herpes Simplex Viruses (HSV 1 & 2) Qx Amplified DNA Assays for qualitative detection and differentiation of HSV1 and HSV2 DNA in anogenital lesion swabs using SDA on BD Viper System.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of HSV1 and HSV2 DNA in clinician-collected external anogenital lesion specimens from symptomatic individuals, to aid in diagnosis of anogenital HSV1 and HSV2 infections.
